ta.title: ලුණු මිල පහළට
body_lines: நிறுவனத்தின் தலைவர் சிலோன் சால்ட் கம்பெனி உப்பு கலப்பு விலையில் குறைக்கப்பட்டது. நந்தனா திலகா கூறினார்.
මේ අනුව ලුණු මිල පොදු වෙළෙඳ පොළෙන්  හා සතොසෙන් මිලදී ගැනීමේ ද ආකාර දෙකකට අඩු වී තිබේ.
1 கிலோ ரூ. 180 ஐ பொது சந்தையில் இருந்து ரூ. 150 மற்றும் விலை ரூ.

en.title: Salt prices down
body_lines: Ceylon Salt Company The President of the company was reduced to the prices of salt mixed. Nandana Thilaka said.
Accordingly, the price of salt has decreased by the public market and the Sathosen.
Prices have been reduced by Rs.
The Chairman said that Sathosalon Corporation could be purchased at Rs. 90 grams of salt.
1 kg sold at Rs. 180 can be purchased from the public market to Rs. 150 and can be priced at Rs.
